title: CPC announces fuel price hike
body_lines: The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (CPC) has increased the fuel prices with effect from 3 a.m. today (May 24), the CPC said in a statement.
Accordingly, the price of petrol Octane 92 has been increased by Rs. 82 per litre and petrol Octane 95 has been increased by Rs. 77 per litre.
The price of Auto Diesel has been increased by Rs. 111 per litre while Super Diesel by Rs. 116.
